liquidlen8: You were just floating in the water! Maybe your allergic to plastic blowup floaties. I was wondering how your pet stoma was going to react to that non English water!?! Look, you could have taken your granddaughter to see your sister in Myrtle Beach SC. While there, could have got sick and fell going to the pool and broke your back. And by the way, I'm not pitting yours against my wife's, but this is the first time I've not been by her side helping her in thirty years. I know you have friends and family surrounding you. I've followed you for more than a year and know that the guy in your life now is one who you may spend the rest of your life with. I've made many mistakes in my 57 years, but the most grievous one was loosing my wife over drinking. I know this is a long comment but it is important that those around you or I, need to know this truth. My wife was born without a right hand. I was born on this Earth to take care of her. I failed. Now, Susie is in Myrtle Beach and I'm in Pittsburgh. Thank God for the ones you have around you. Blink, and you may have nothing. I pray you have God like I do. Keep up the good fight. Blessings.
